text: Anxiety will raise and fall on its own.
subphrase: Breathe deeply in 4 seconds, then exhale for 6 seconds.

text: The scenarios you imagine do not necessarily reflect reality.
subphrase: Name 5 things you can see, 4 things you can hear, 3 things you can touch.

text: Dont try to fight your thoughts, just let them pass.
subphrase: Name 2 things you can touch, and 1 thing you can taste.
